data.description:
Step into the immersive world of "Lightning Archer," a captivating VR tower defense game where your precision and strategy are the keys to salvation. In this enchanting realm, your mission is to protect your beautiful cities using unparalleled archery skills. Wield your enchanted bow and arrows, tools not just of defense but of artistry and power, as you stand guard over your beloved homeland.

Key Features:
1. Exhilarating Shooting Experience: Enjoy intuitive gameplay that's easy to master.
2. Mischievous Monsters and Bosses: Battle against monsters and bosses with unique attack methods and defensive characteristics.
3. Gorgeous Diverse Scenery: Explore environments ranging from airy forests and vibrant deserts to serene islands.
4. Ancient Runes: Summon mythical beasts to boost your combat abilities.
5. Cool Magical Skills: Experience the thrill of wielding the powers of ancient warriors.
6.  Multi-Dimensional Honor Rewards:
•	Earn rewards for long shots, mass kills, combos.
•	Collect a variety of honor medals.
•	Rise up the global leaderboards to become a world-saving hero.

changelog.change_log:
“V1.2.0
1. Added two new types of monster: Bomb Bird and Bomberman.
2. Electric towers can attack any monsters except for Bosses, with activation count changed from time-based to attack count-based.
3. Players can immediately respawn in the same place if they fail to defeat a Boss.
V1.1.0
1. Added a new training ground for beginners to help new users master the use of skills.
2. Appropriately adjusted the difficulty levels of the stages.”

Version 1.1 Change Log:
1. Added a new training ground for beginners to help new users master the use of skills.
2. Appropriately adjusted the difficulty levels of the stages.
